page.title: 17BANKHEAD FARM
page.content: Bankhead Farm is situated about 1km north west of Crombie Point. The owner of the farm is Mr. James Wishart Snr. It is a family farm and it has been there since 1776. It covers 160 acres. Mr. Wishart has one full time colleague,his son, Stewart Wishart. On the farm there are bullocks, cats and and a dog. Mr. Wishart owns 6 tractors,1 conbine, a car and a van. {The farm has barley, potatoes, {vegetables and grassland.}They sell their products to local merchants. They also have a small{farm shop.}In the summer casual workers are employed to bring in the harvest.
